name: UFOs and Castles
description:
An endless tower defense. Defend against the aliens trying to destroy your kingdom.

WASD/Arrow Keys control the camera. Left click to spawn a tower and move it around, then right click to place it and return to controlling the camera. Towers cost 50 points, and defeating an enemy grants 10 points. The scroll wheel allows you to zoom out somewhat.

==========

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Ally ground units were intended, but due to time constraints were not implemented. Restarting in-game may or may not be functional by the time this was submitted.

Credit to Kenney Game Assets 1 for Map Tile, Structure, and Enemy assets.
